name: Mage School: The RPG!
description:
This was a game I made as a final project during 2014-2015, with a few minor changes a few months later. It's an RPG of sorts! Dialogue, skills, battles, and lots of animals!

There are 4 battles to go through, and no game over screen. After the 3rd battle, you need to use (click) the top-right menu to use a skill on the crates to the south in order to progress; I didn't really think to add tutorial messages to explain this, so I ought to say that here.

Also ignite doesn't cause burn, I ran out of time to add that feature, sadly.

The main font for dialogue and menu options is Hey Gorgeous, and can be found here:

http://www.kevinandamanda.com/fonts/freescrapbookfonts/hey-gorgeous/
